entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH IN EFFECT, Granby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 26.3°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or thunderstorms. Low 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Showers or thunderstorms beginning overnight. Risk of a severe thunderstorm overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. Temperature steady near 18.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near 18. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
